DefaultEvent.Description: Dark blotches and white flashes alternate before your eyes; your lungs are sacks of salty gravel. You claw wildly through the water towards your vessel; into the airlock; gasping in the inch of air with your face pressed to the ceiling as the water is pumped out. You are left on the floor, choking the last of the Nookwater from your lungs. No wonder the Nookers rarely leave.
